references.paper_title: The great time series classification bake off: A review and experimental evaluation of recent algorithmic advances
references.reason: This paper is a seminal review of the field of time series classification, comparing state-of-the-art algorithms and establishing common benchmarks.
This paper introduced the UCR time series archive, a widely used collection of benchmark datasets that have significantly shaped the field.

references.paper_title: InceptionTime: Finding AlexNet for time series classification
references.reason: This paper introduced InceptionTime, a highly influential deep learning model for time series classification that has significantly improved classification accuracy.

references.paper_title: Rocket: Exceptionally fast and accurate time series classification using random convolutional kernels
references.reason: This paper introduced Rocket, a highly efficient and accurate time series classification method based on random convolutional kernels that significantly reduces computation time.

references.paper_title: HIVE-COTE 2.0: A new meta ensemble for time series classification
references.reason: This paper introduced HIVE-COTE 2.0, a meta-ensemble method that combines multiple time series classification algorithms to achieve state-of-the-art results.
